title: Glimpses
description: A freelance project done for an arts website

title: I heart Film
description: A website for an organisation of film producers based in Bahrain

title: Black Boxes
description: Website for a digital art project called Black Boxes

title: HomeBrew
description: A fictional home brewing subscription website. This was my final project as part of my General Assembly Front End Web Development course. It is a static website built with Sass, html and vanilla Javascript

title: Would You Rather
description: Part of my Udacity React Nanodegree, a game of Would You Rather, that allows a user to log in from a pre set list of users, create questions, vote on other questions, and see a leaderboard. Built with React, Redux, Context Api and Sass.

title: Mars Rover Dashboard
description: Part of my Udacity Intermediate Javascript Nanodegree. A dashboard showing the information of 3 different Mars Rovers and an image of the day, consuming data from the Nasa Mars Rover api. Built with JS functional programming paradigm, Immutable JS library and Sass

title: Frontend Mentor projects
description: A link to my Front End Mentor profile page, showing a list of completed challenges
